00019 #ifndef SP_STREAM_OPERATOR_H
00020 #define SP_STREAM_OPERATOR_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpStreamOutput.h"
00023 #include "SpStreamInput.h"
00024 #include "SpStreamBuffer.h"
00025 
00026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 
00028 namespace Spark
00029 {
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 class SpStreamOperator: public SpStreamOutput, public SpStreamInput
00035 {
00036 
00038 public:
00039 
00040     SpStreamOperator();
00041     virtual ~SpStreamOperator();
00042 
00044 public:
00045 
00046     //: Sets the current input stream
00047     virtual void setInputStream(SpStreamInput * pkInputStream);
00048 
00049     //: Returns true if the current state has been modified
00050     virtual bool hasChanged();
00051 
00052     //: Returns the output buffer
00053     virtual bool sendOutputToBuffer( SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback * pkOutput);
00054 
00056 protected:
00057 
00058     //: Performs the stream computation
00059     virtual bool compute(SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback *pkCopy);
00060 
00061     //: Activates the output stream, if necessary
00062     virtual bool enableOutputStream(SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback *pkCopy);
00063 
00064     //: Sets the necessary state for the stream operation
00065     virtual bool setupState(SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback *pkCopy);
00066 
00067     //: Performs the stream operation
00068     virtual bool processStream(SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback *pkCopy);
00069 
00070     //: Puts the results of the operation into the output stream.
00071     virtual bool updateOutputStream(SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback *pkCopy);
00072 
00073     //: Resets the state
00074     virtual bool resetState(SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback *pkCopy);
00075 
00076     //: Deactivates the output stream, if necessary
00077     virtual bool disableOutputStream(SpStreamBuffer* pkBuffer, SpStreamFeedback *pkCopy);
00078 
00079 };
00080 
00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 
00083 }   // end namespace: Spark
00084 
00085 #endif
